Their signature burger was juicy and flavorful, one of the best I've had in a long time.
Don't forget to try their sweet potato fries they were perfectly crispy!
The pizza was decent, nothing spectacular but solid.
Service was a bit slow, but the staff were friendly enough when they finally got to us.
For the quality and portion sizes, the bill felt quite expensive.
The interior decor was quite charming and unique, making for a nice backdrop.
The pasta dish I ordered was absolutely incredible, perfectly cooked and seasoned.
Our server was very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal.
The atmosphere here is truly charming, with soft lighting and comfortable seating.
However, we waited quite a long time for our food to arrive, which was a bit frustrating.
The prices were a little on the higher side for what you get, making it less of a value.
Unfortunately, the burger I got was undercooked and quite bland, a real disappointment.
Considering the poor quality, the bill felt surprisingly steep, not worth the expense at all.
This cafe is in a prime spot right by the bustling park, which is fantastic for people-watching and easily accessible.
The coffee was decent, nothing spectacular but certainly drinkable and served promptly.
Every single dish we tried, from the delicate appetizers to the rich dessert, was a culinary delight and beautifully presented.
The staff went above and beyond, providing truly exceptional service with genuine warmth and efficiency.
The elegant decor created a truly wonderful dining experience, and the overall ambiance was truly memorable and inviting.
